info.title: Machine Learning Workspaces Management Client
info.description: These APIs allow end users to operate on Azure Machine Learning Workspace resources. They support CRUD operations for Azure Machine Learning Workspaces.

get.description: Lists all of the available Azure Machine Learning Studio REST API operations.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Lists all the available machine learning workspaces under the specified subscription.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Lists all the available machine learning workspaces under the specified resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Gets the properties of the specified machine learning workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

put.description: Creates or updates a workspace with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.

requestBody.description: The parameters for creating or updating a machine learning workspace.

200.description: The request was successful; the resource already exists and was updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

204.description: The machine learning workspace does not exist in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

patch.description: Updates a machine learning workspace with the specified parameters.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.

requestBody.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning workspace.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.description: List the authorization keys associated with this workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

post.description: Resync storage keys associated with this workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

ErrorResponse.description: The error response send when an operation fails.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

Operation.description: Azure Machine Learning Studio REST API operation

value.description: List of AML Studio operations supported by the AML Studio resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: An array of operations supported by the resource provider.

location.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

tier.description: Tier of the sku like Basic or Enterprise

Workspace.description: An object that represents a machine learning workspace.

primaryToken.description: Primary authorization key for this workspace.

secondaryToken.description: Secondary authorization key for this workspace.

WorkspaceKeysResponse.description: Workspace authorization keys for a workspace.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of machine learning workspaces.

value.description: The list of machine learning workspaces. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of machine learning workspaces.

WorkspaceListResult.description: The result of a request to list machine learning workspace keys.

creationTime.description: The creation time for this workspace resource.

keyVaultIdentifierId.description: The key vault identifier used for encrypted workspaces.

ownerEmail.description: The email id of the owner for this workspace.

studioEndpoint.description: The regional endpoint for the machine learning studio service which hosts this workspace.

userStorageAccountId.description: The fully qualified arm id of the storage account associated with this workspace.

workspaceId.description: The immutable id associated with this workspace.

workspaceState.description: The current state of workspace resource.

WorkspaceProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning workspace.

keyVaultIdentifierId.description: The key vault identifier used for encrypted workspaces.

workspaceState.description: The current state of workspace resource.

WorkspacePropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a machine learning workspace.

tags.description: The resource tags for the machine learning workspace.

WorkspaceUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning workspace.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group to which the machine learning workspace belongs.

WorkspaceNameParameter.name: workspaceName
WorkspaceNameParameter.description: The name of the machine learning workspace.
